author: lundblad
msg: On wc-propcaching branch: Rework parts of svn_wc__prop_set2().
When determining what kind an entry has, use the kind stored in the entry,
not the kind of the on-disk file.
When checking for keyword modifications, use the values in memory
instead of reading it from disk before and after modifying the property.
Use svn_wc__load_props() to load base and working properties.
Include the entry modification in the log instead of doing it after
Kill the last TODO in the code on this branch.

author: dws
msg: * STATUS: Propose r17449 for 1.3.0 which makes the RPMs build again on

author: dws
msg: Unbreak the tests on Redhat 7.3 (python 2.2) which doesn't have True and False.

author: karolszk
msg: * subversion/po/pl.po: translated 2 messages and updated some fuzziness.

author: rooneg
msg: On the ra-replay-dev branch: Add cancellation support to svnsync.
(signal_handler): New function, a signal handler callback.
(do_synchronize): Wrap the sync editor in a cancellation editor
so we can correctly error out while syncing.
(main): Set up handlers for the various signals we want to catch,
pass our cancellation callback to svn_cmdline_setup_auth_baton so
we can be cancelled when being prompted.
